entities.name: nearly headless nick
entities.description: Nearly Headless Nick is a ghost who tries to give a speech, but his audience gets distracted by the game of Head Hockey.

entities.name: sir patrick
entities.description: Sir Patrick is a member of the Headless Hunt and plays a game of Head Hockey that distracts Nearly Headless Nick's audience.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is a student who is cold, hungry, and wants to leave the dance floor where the ghosts are dancing.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is Harry's friend who is also cold and hungry, and agrees with Harry that they should leave the dance floor.

relationships.description: Sir Patrick's game of Head Hockey distracts Nearly Headless Nick's audience, causing him to lose their attention.
Harry and Ron agree that they should leave the dance floor together.
